snippet: The average Wall Street bonus was down to $121,150; the biggest buyout was a Texas-sized bust; and Gordon Gekko began cooperating with the F.B.I. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.
abstract: The average Wall Street bonus was down to $121,150; the biggest buyout was a Texas-sized bust; and Gordon Gekko began cooperating with the F.B.I. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.
